quote: It's fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
author: Marie Curie

quote: The scientists of today think deeply instead of clearly. One must be sane to think clearly, but one can think deeply and be quite insane.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: That brain of mine is something more than merely mortal; as time will show.
author: Ada Lovelace

quote: Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: The Web does not just connect machines, it connects people.
author: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: It is not a question of whether we will use computers, but how we will use them.
author: Grace Hopper
